card.name: Always Watching
card.property: Nontoken creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Angel of Deliverance
card.property: Flying Delirium — Whenever this creature deals damage, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, exile target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Angelic Purge
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent. Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment.

card.name: Apothecary Geist
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, if you control another Spirit, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Archangel Avacyn
card.property: Flash Flying, vigilance When Archangel Avacyn enters, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform Archangel Avacyn at the beginning of the next upkeep.

alternate.name: Avacyn, the Purifier
alternate.property: Flying When this creature transforms into Avacyn, the Purifier, it deals 3 damage to each other creature and each opponent.

card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if this creature is equipped, transform it.

card.name: Falkenrath Gorger
card.property: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Goldnight Castigator
